alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Marion; Monongalia; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Western Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 02 at 9:24PM EST until February 04 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THURSDAY TO 10 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations up to 3 inches and ice accumulations of one to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of northwest, southwest, and western Pennsylvania. Portions of northern West Virginia. * WHEN...From 7 AM Thursday to 10 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Marion; Monongalia; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Western Tucker
